movies.Plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
movies.Title: Blade Runner
movies.Writer: Hampton Fancher (screenplay), David Webb Peoples (screenplay), Philip K. Dick (novel)
movies.Actors: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young, Edward James Olmos
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 11 wins & 16 nominations.

movies.Plot: Five high school students, all different stereotypes, meet in detention, where they pour their hearts out to each other, and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.
movies.Title: The Breakfast Club
movies.Actors: Emilio Estevez, Paul Gleason, Anthony Michael Hall, John Kapelos

movies.Plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies.Title: Pulp Fiction
movies.Writer: Quentin Tarantino (story), Roger Avary (story), Quentin Tarantino
movies.Actors: Tim Roth, Amanda Plummer, Laura Lovelace, John Travolta

movies.Plot: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.
movies.Title: Clueless
movies.Actors: Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy, Paul Rudd

movies.Plot: In order to get out of the snobby clique that is destroying her good-girl reputation, an intelligent teen teams up with a dark sociopath in a plot to kill the cool kids.
movies.Title: Heathers
movies.Actors: Winona Ryder, Christian Slater, Shannen Doherty, Lisanne Falk

movies.Plot: A 16-year old girl is given 13 hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King.
movies.Title: Labyrinth
movies.Writer: Dennis Lee (story), Jim Henson (story), Terry Jones (screenplay)
movies.Actors: David Bowie, Jennifer Connelly, Toby Froud, Shelley Thompson
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 nominations.
